title: why won't Pixel 3a bluetooth discover my aukey earbuds?
content:
Pixel 3a and AUKEY EP-B40 Latitude Wireless Earbud.
Yes I know how to pair, and I followed the instructions, and I've tried rebooting the pixel and turning both devices on and off in every possible configuration/order -- I've tried everything I can think of.  
The pixel DOES find all the other bluetooth devices in the area.
The aukey earbuds DO still pair with my iphone.

Any ideas? Very frustrated. Thanks in advance!
